lyric:
[00:20.060]I've been living with a shadow overhead
[00:24.530]I've been sleeping with a cloud above my bed
[00:29.720]I've been lonely for so long
[00:33.760]Trapped in the past
[00:35.780]I just can not seem to move on
[00:39.210]I've been hiding all my hopes and dreams away
[00:44.020]Just in case I ever need them again someday
[00:48.810]I've been setting aside time
[00:52.800]To clear a little space in the corners of my mind
[00:58.980]All I wanna do is find a way back into love
[01:08.580]I can't make it through without a way back into love
[01:16.170]Oh oh oh
[01:21.150]
[01:22.260]I've been watching but the stars refuse to shine
[01:26.970]I've been searching but I just don't see the signs
[01:32.230]I know that it is out there
[01:35.970]There is got to be something for my soul somewhere
[01:41.630]I've  been looking for someone to share some lights
[01:46.250]Not just somebody just to get me through the night
[01:51.790]I could use some direction
[01:56.510]And I'm open to your suggestions
[02:01.740]All I wanna do is find a way back into love
[02:11.360]I can't make it through without a way back into love
[02:18.870]And if I open my heart again
[02:23.970]I guess I am hoping you'll be there for me in the end
[02:32.990]Ho~
[02:40.460]Hu yeah~ ng~~
[02:49.180]There are moments when I don't know if it's real
[02:53.890]Or if anybody feels the way I feel
[02:59.080]I need inspiration
[03:02.900]Not just another negotiation
[03:08.400]
[03:10.230]All I wanna do is find a way back into love
[03:19.820]I can't make it through without a way back into love
[03:27.370]And if I open my heart to you
[03:31.920]I'm hoping you'll show me what to do
[03:36.940]And if you help me to start again
[03:42.890]You know that I'll be there for you in the end
[03:53.970]Ho~
[03:55.520]Da da la ta la~
[04:05.630]Ho~
[04:08.950]
[04:12.490]
[04:12.890]
[04:15.720]
tlyric:
[by:十自在]
[00:20.060]我已在阴影之下生活了多久
[00:24.530]我辗转反侧在乌云之下多久
[00:29.720]我已孤独了多久
[00:33.760]沉溺于过往
[00:35.780]我似乎摆脱不了
[00:39.210]我把希望和梦想隐藏了多久
[00:44.020]就是想要有一天能再次发光
[00:48.810]我已忘记时间多久
[00:52.800]去清理思绪中的小小角落
[00:58.980]我所有想要的只是重新找回爱情
[01:08.580]否则的话我又该如何才能够渡过
[01:16.170]噢噢噢
[01:22.260]星光不愿照耀我已经有多久
[01:26.970]我看不到任何征兆已有多久
[01:32.230]我知道它不在这儿
[01:35.970]一定有什么在等待着我的心
[01:41.630]我想找人分享光亮已经多久
[01:46.250]不仅仅是陪我度过漫漫夜晚
[01:51.790]我愿告诉你一些方向
[01:56.510]我更想倾听你怎么想
[02:01.740]我所有想要的只是重新找回爱情
[02:11.360]否则的话我又该如何才能够渡过
[02:18.870]若再次对你敞开心扉
[02:23.970]我想最终你会站在我这一边
[02:32.990]噢
[02:40.460]噢耶
[02:49.180]有一刻我不敢相信一切是真的
[02:53.890]要是有人感受到我的感受
[02:59.080]请给我灵感
[03:02.900]而不是另一场冷冷的谈判
[03:10.230]我所有想要的只是重新找回爱情
[03:19.820]否则的话我又该如何才能够渡过
[03:27.370]若我对你敞开了心扉
[03:31.920]我希望你告诉我做什么
[03:36.940]若你帮助我回到起点
[03:42.890]你知道我最终会站在你这边
[03:53.970]噢
[03:55.520]哒哒啦嗒啦
[04:05.630]噢
